channel.title: Jacobr tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from Jacobr.

item.description: @bijans This is indeed a huge (and long overdue) deal.
item.source:markdown: @bijans This is indeed a huge (and long overdue) deal.

item.description:
Today's pet peeve: default settings for Enterprise Device Management Software requiring mind-numbing complexity of passwords

#UnInstalled - and -

pwpolicy -clearaccountpolicies

to remove remnants left behind (Mac OS)

Reminder from NIST: https://t.co/FJ8d4ye5V8 https://t.co/unoDtx5ZqZ
item.source:markdown:
Today's pet peeve: default settings for Enterprise Device Management Software requiring mind-numbing complexity of passwords
#UnInstalled - and -
pwpolicy -clearaccountpolicies
to remove remnants left behind (Mac OS)
Reminder from NIST: https://t.co/FJ8d4ye5V8 https://t.co/unoDtx5ZqZ

item.description: @bijans I forget what this is called but I remember that it's interesting ...
item.source:markdown: @bijans I forget what this is called but I remember that it's interesting ...

item.description: @amalec Poking @ them with a needle ... in the eye!
item.source:markdown: @amalec Poking @ them with a needle ... in the eye!

item.description: @HITPrivacy @motorcycle_guy Who are you calling a fool?
item.source:markdown: @HITPrivacy @motorcycle_guy Who are you calling a fool?

item.description: @HITPrivacy @motorcycle_guy Hadn't thought about Insta / Tiktok. On it.
item.source:markdown: @HITPrivacy @motorcycle_guy Hadn't thought about Insta / Tiktok. On it.

item.description:
@motorcycle_guy Oops - yes HSA not HRA.

No comment on the DICOM? Thought you'd like: a) anonymization with the upload was automatic - kinda cool. b) Standards compliance c) reminder that we can tweet our own PHI and OCR will applaud - right @HITPrivacy ?
item.source:markdown:
@motorcycle_guy Oops - yes HSA not HRA.
No comment on the DICOM? Thought you'd like: a) anonymization with the upload was automatic - kinda cool. b) Standards compliance c) reminder that we can tweet our own PHI and OCR will applaud - right @HITPrivacy ?

item.description:
@motorcycle_guy I was there today too. $$ part was easy (paid with HRA).

'cept this. Might need an extraction ==> implant #FeelingOld. See the cracked cusp? #granola :-(

DICOM fun:

https://t.co/vZhCWG7qAQ https://t.co/OPDX0cyi2f

item.description: @amalec #TimeToFindANewProvider (yeh - I said "provider" - let's not assume that the "p" means physician)

item.description: It's my #Twitterversary! I have been on Twitter for 16 years, since 17 Jul 2006 (via @twi_age).
item.source:markdown: It's my #Twitterversary! I have been on Twitter for 16 years, since 17 Jul 2006 (via @twi_age).
